reviews.text: No problems with the station itself, trains I've taken have been on time and clearly displayed on the displays around the station, with plenty of staff around to ask for help if needed. Only gets a 4-star due to the station not been the cleanest station I've seen. some of the interiors could use work.

This station needs an upgrade. Ideally canopy renewals and refurbished toilets. Also the platforms could be re tarmacked with Zone markings. Some of the food outlets could also be improved! Some of the staff could be less rude and aggressive. Hope this helps 👍

It was such a nice visit to Southampton Central Station and my first time seeing Cross Country for real after watching lots of videos of it on YouTube. 😂😂😂😂😉😉😉😉

Cross Country operates their voyagers from Southampton Central towards Bournemouth, Manchester Piccadilly, Birmingham New Street, Leeds, Newcastle, Edinburgh and many more.

Nothing wrong with this busy station. I found the staff to be friendly and accommodating. Large waiting room and no shortage of the food and drink you would expect to find at such a location. Not the cleanest.
Nice helpfull staff . Makes a nice change
